title: Lesson 69
paragraph: Notification and endorsement ensure accountability. Proper communication, authorization, and privacy maintenance strengthen trust and compliance.

words.meaning: to cleanse or flow; to redden
words.example: He flushed the pipes with water.
Please notify me of any changes.

words.meaning: a thread or leave in a difficult situation
words.example: The boat stranded on the shore.

words.meaning: able to be approved or supported
words.example: The plan is endorseable by the committee.
The lab is fully equipable with modern tools.
Soldiers were in stationing along the border.
The document is referable for research.

words.meaning: able to be imposed or implemented
words.example: The law is enforceable in all states.
